## Description

This readme lists and briefly describes the files submitted for the final project of the Johns Hopkins Getting and Cleaning Data Coursera course.

## Files

* **run_analysis.r**--- Contains the script which loads, formats, and subsets the data based on the assignment instructions. Contains comments describing the code.

* **tidydata.txt**---Contains the subsetted data frame generated from the run_analysis.r script containing the mean of the measurements grouped by subject and activity.

* **Codebook.md**---Contains a description of the imported data sets, variables, and lists of tasks to clean and subset the data.
